item.title: Digital Garden
item.description: Digital Garden What exactly is digital gardening? If you don’t know what digital gardens are, just think of it as a personal Wikipedia, the end goal isn’t a perfectly written article, instead the process of slowly growing the interconnected knowledge is what digital gardening cares about.
